field.name: downloadable_product_samples
field.description: An array containing information about samples of this downloadable product.

field.name: downloadable_product_links
field.description: An array containing information about the links for this downloadable product.

field.name: links_purchased_separately
field.description: A value of 1 indicates that each link in the array must be purchased separately.

field.name: links_title
field.description: The heading above the list of downloadable products

field.name: id
field.description: The unique ID for the downloadable product sample

field.name: title
field.description: The display name of the sample

field.name: sort_order
field.description: A number indicating the sort order.

field.name: sample_type
field.description: Either FILE or URL

field.name: sample_file
field.description: The relative path to the downloadable sample

field.name: sample_url
field.description: The relative URL to the downloadable sample

field.name: id
field.description: The unique ID for the link to the downloadable product

field.name: title
field.description: The display name of the link

field.name: sort_order
field.description: A number indicating the sort order.

field.name: is_shareable
field.description: Indicates whether the link is shareable

field.name: price
field.description: The price of the downloadable product

field.name: number_of_downloads
field.description: The maximum number of times the product can be downloaded. A value of 0 means unlimited.

field.name: link_type
field.description: Either FILE or URL

field.name: sample_type
field.description: Either FILE or URL

field.name: sample_file
field.description: The relative path to the downloadable sample

field.name: sample_url
field.description: The relative URL to the downloadable sample
